T -
Direct Known Subclasses:
BubblePlot
public class Plot2D<T>
extends Plot<T>

A plot for displaying Bi-dimensional values, either as lines, areas, markers or any combination of these

Author:
rdunklau

Method Detail

setTension

public void setTension(java.lang.String tension)
Parameters:
tension - : the "tension" to be applied. It allows you to add some curve to the lines Default : 1 If : -tension > 1 : lines are "curved" -tension = "X" : best curve -tension = "S" : smooth -tension < 1 : edges are "sharpened"

setShadow

public void setShadow(int width,
                      int dx,
                      int dy)
Creates a shadow

Parameters:
width - : the shadow's width
dx - : shadow's x position from the line
dy - : shadow's y position from the line

setShowMarkers

public void setShowMarkers(boolean show)
Parameters:
show - : Set wether to show the markers or not. Overrides the default "PLOT_TYPE" behavior.

setShowLines

public void setShowLines(boolean show)
Parameters:
show - : Set wether to show the lines or not. Overrides the default "PLOT_TYPE" behavior.
